text: Élie Brousse (28 August 1921 – 2 July 2019) was a French rugby league player. He played as a second-row. He played for Roanne, Marseille and Lyon Villeurbanne in the French Rugby League Championship. He played for the French national team 31 times between 1946 and 1953. He was born in Bages, Aude. Brousse died on 2 July 2019 in Roanne, at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Occitanie Category:People from Aude Category:Rugby league players
title: Élie Brousse
